short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to start chat on WhatsApp without saving phone number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension was initially developed to help increase productivity of our customer service team and save their time. Later it was realized that it can be of help for a lot of organizations.

Features

1. Start chats with unknown number (without saving)
2. Start chats from anywhere when clicked on wa.me links

The project is open source and code can be found at https://github.com/syncloudsoftech/InstantWebChat
